Title: Your Best Year Ever, Chapter 15: You Can Trigger Success
Description:
The 15th chapter of Your Best Year Ever explores activation triggers. Studies show that those who use activation triggers are three times more likely to succeed. Michael will walk you through the ins-and-outs.

Reminder that this is one chapter in Michael Hyatt's revised and updated best-selling book, Your Best Year Ever. Over the few weeks, we'll be releasing a few chapters at a time so that you can be prepared for 2024 to be your Best Year Ever.

If you want to read or listen to the entire book today, then visit www.yourbestyeareverbook.com and pick up a copy. After buying the book, make sure to sign up for your FREE ticket to Your Best Year Ever Live (a $197 value!).
